name: Play,Wander and Eat like a local here in Tarlac!
description: Tarlac also known as a gateway to Northen Luzon and Metro Manila.A multicultural place of the Central Luzon provinces.Where the local are friendly and mixture of either Tagalog,Ilocano or Kapampangan.Tarlac is a place where you will experience the city life and countryside of the Philippines.
